data.title: Eric Dolphy Discography
data.meta_description: Eric Dolphy [Eric Allan Dolphy Jr.] (born June 20, 1928, Los Angeles, CA; died June 29, 1964, Berlin, West Germany; aged 36), alto sax, bass clarinet, flute.
